```{r}
                rep("2. Programaci√≥n y an√°lisis de datos", 7), 
                rep("4. Gesti√≥n de bases de datos", 3),

`PROGRAMAS INFORM√ÅTICOS` <- c("Google Cloud", "Azure", "AWS","R", "Python", "SAS (Base, Enterpride Guide, SQL)", "SPSS", "Spark (R, Python)", "Excel (VBA)", "C++", "MySQL", "MongoDB", "AWS (Redshift)", "Shiny", "Power BI", "Tableau", "Ingl√©s", "Franc√©s", "NacSport (Scout PLUS)", "Eric SPORTS", "OPTA", "Wyscout", "Instat")
RATING <- c(4,4,4,5,5,4,3,5,4,3,5,4,4,5,4,4,4,3,4,4,4,4,4)

data <- cbind.data.frame(CATEGORIAS, `PROGRAMAS INFORM√ÅTICOS`, RATING)

rating_bolts <- function(rating, max_rating = 5) {
  bolt_icon <- function(empty = FALSE) {
    tagAppendAttributes(shiny::icon("bolt"),
      style = paste("color:", if (empty) "#edf0f2" else "gold"),
      "aria-hidden" = "true"
    )
  }
  rounded_rating <- floor(rating + 0.5)  # always round up
  bolts <- lapply(seq_len(max_rating), function(i) {
    if (i <= rounded_rating) bolt_icon() else bolt_icon(empty = TRUE)
  })
  label <- sprintf("%s out of %s bolt", rating, max_rating)
  div(title = label, role = "img", bolts)
}

reactable(
  data,
  groupBy = "CATEGORIAS",
  searchable = FALSE,
  columns = list(
    CATEGORIAS = colDef(minWidth = 100, align = "left"),
    `PROGRAMAS INFORM√ÅTICOS` = colDef(style = list(fontWeight = "bold"),
                                      aggregate = "unique",
                                      align = "left"
                                      ),
    RATING = colDef(
      cell = function(value) rating_bolts(value),
      aggregate = "mean",
      aggregated = JS("function(cellInfo) {
        return cellInfo.value.toLocaleString('es-ES', { maximumFractionDigits: 2 })
      }"),
      align = "center"
    )
  ),
  defaultExpanded = TRUE,
  defaultSorted = list(CATEGORIAS = "asc", RATING = "desc")
)
```
